price: 40. Kuwa looga soo saaray guryahoodii xaq darro iyagoon waxba geysan, inay yidhaahdeen maahee: Rabbigayo waa Allaah.” Haddayna jirin ku difaacidda Alle dadka qaarkoodba qaar, waxaa la dumin lahaa sawmacado, kaniisado, macaabid, iyo masaajidyo gudahooda Magaca Alle in badan lagu xuso. Allena wuu u gargaari kuwa u gargaara (Diintiisa), hubaal Alle waa Xoog Badane, Adkaada.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ أُخۡرِجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِم بِغَيۡرِ حَقٍّ إِلَّآ أَن يَقُولُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُۗ وَلَوۡلَا دَفۡعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعۡضَهُم بِبَعۡضٖ لَّهُدِّمَتۡ صَوَٰمِعُ وَبِيَعٞ وَصَلَوَٰتٞ وَمَسَٰجِدُ يُذۡكَرُ فِيهَا ٱسۡمُ ٱللَّهِ كَثِيرٗاۗ وَلَيَنصُرَنَّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ukh'rijū min diyārihim bighayri ḥaqqin illā an yaqūlū rabbunā al-lahu walawlā dafʿu al-lahi al-nāsa baʿḍahum bibaʿḍin lahuddimat ṣawāmiʿu wabiyaʿun waṣalawātun wamasājidu yudh'karu fīhā us'mu al-lahi kathīran walayanṣuranna al-lahu man yanṣuruhu inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
